It also won the Brit Award for Best single in 1988. The album was itself a UK number one and would go on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide.

The legendary video was directed by Simon West ‚Äì who later went on to make Hollywood blockbusters such as Con Air, Lara Croft ‚Äì Tomb Raider and The Expendables 2.  The video passed the 1bn YouTube views milestone on 28 July 2021.
